title: Yossi and the Monkeys: A Shavuot Story
description: Yossi has no money to buy the food and flowers his family needs for Shavuot. He tries selling the kippahs his wife sewed, but he has no luckâ€•until a mischievous monkey shows up. The monkey's antics attract customers and win Yossi's heart . . . but did Yossi's new friend come to stay?
author: Jennifer Tzivia MacLeod
